column2: A Systems Approach to Global Engineering
column3: Introduces engineering students to the global context in which engineers are asked to operate in the 21st century using system dynamics tools and other decision-making tools (network analysis, agent based modeling, etc.) necessary to analyze the uncertainty and complexity inherent in global projects.
At the graduate level, covers topics of interest in global engineering. Content varies by section and from semester to semester.
